description.plain: Born in Neew Zealand, Jawsh 685, or Joshua Christian Nanai, has produced hit records at only 17 years old.

body.plain: Born in Neew Zealand, Jawsh 685, or Joshua Christian Nanai, has produced hit records at only 17 years old.

songs.title: Laxed (Siren Beat)

description.plain: “Laxed (Siren Beat)” is an instrumental song that went viral through the “TikTok” app, on April 2020, it was first seen on July 24, 2019 on a YouTube channel, and due to the new tiktok trend it was become relevant. This is mainly due to users on the popular video-sharing platform, TikTok, uploading videos of themselves dancing to it.

songs.embed_content: Read “Laxed (Siren Beat)” by Jawsh 685 on Genius

body.plain: “Laxed (Siren Beat)” is an instrumental song that went viral through the “TikTok” app, on April 2020, it was first seen on July 24, 2019 on a YouTube channel, and due to the new tiktok trend it was become relevant. This is mainly due to users on the popular video-sharing platform, TikTok, uploading videos of themselves dancing to it.
